itinerary.mapNote: Natural thermal pool camp. First glacier views. 4450m.
High lake camp. Palomani Pass 5100m crossed. 4800m.
Campa Pass 5050m. Southeast side of Ausangate. 4600m.
Day trip to Rainbow Mountain (Vinicunca) 5200m. Same camp. 4600m.
Apacheta Pass 5050m. Return to Tinqui trailhead. 3900m.

waypoints.name: Ausangate Summit
waypoints.note: Highest peak in Cusco region. Sacred Apu (mountain god).

waypoints.name: Rainbow Mountain (Vinicunca)
waypoints.note: Striped mineral mountain. One of Peru's viral landmarks.

waypoints.name: Palomani Pass
waypoints.note: First high pass on circuit. Glacier views.

waypoints.name: Campa Pass
waypoints.note: Southeast aspect pass. Ausangate south face.

waypoints.name: Apacheta Pass
waypoints.note: Final pass. Return leg toward Tinqui.

waypoints.name: Upis Hot Springs
waypoints.note: Natural thermal pool at 4450m. Unique reward.
